subject: Re: mirrors inactive: debian.teleglobe.net, ftp.lug.udel.edu
body:
On Fri, Apr 27, 2007 at 09:30:33PM +0200, Josip Rodin wrote:
> On Fri, Apr 27, 2007 at 08:53:43PM +0200, Simon Paillard wrote:
> > I will remove old outdated mirrors from packages.d.o.

Done.

> > Frank, do you plan packages.d.o to dynamically use Mirrors.masterlist ?
> 
> I don't think this is possible, because we don't have machine-parseable
> metrics to select which of the 35-odd American mirrors to show.

Maybe displaying at least all the official mirrors, and maybe all push
mirrors ?

Regards,

-- 
Simon Paillard


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
